snippet: Scott I. London, who supervised more than 500 accounting professionals at KPMG, faces a maximum of 20 years in federal prison.
abstract: Scott I London, former senior partner with KPMG, pleads guilty to charge of securities fraud arising from his involvement in insider trading; faces maximum of 20 years in federal prison.
lead_paragraph: Scott I. London, who supervised more than 500 accounting professionals at KPMG, faces a maximum of 20 years in federal prison.

headline.main: Former KPMG Partner Pleads Guilty in Insider Trading Case
headline.print_headline: Former KPMG Partner Pleads Guilty in Insider Trading Case
